scripts.vercel-build: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --save-dev typescript@^5 @types/react@^18 @types/node@^20 tailwindcss@3.4.1 postcss@8.5.6 autoprefixer@10.4.21 && echo '/** @type {import("tailwindcss").Config} */module.exports={content:["./src/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx,mdx}"],theme:{extend:{fontFamily:{hanken:"Hanken Grotesk"}}},plugins:[]};' > tailwind.config.js && echo 'module.exports={plugins:{tailwindcss:{},autoprefixer:{}}};' > postcss.config.js && next build --no-lint
